fieldUpdates.description: Owner current role reflected in the opportunity
fieldUpdates.name: Update Owner Current Role (Opportunity)

rules.fullName: Clear Campaign Brief Complete Checkbox On Cloned Opportunity
rules.description: Clear Campaign Brief Complete Checkbox when an opportunity gets cloned

rules.fullName: NLM Brief Opportunity Update for approvals
rules.description: Updates the NLM Opportunity record types to allow KAM's to submit for approval
rules.formula: AND( $Setup.NLM_Global_Settings__c.Fire_NLM_Workflows__c, (RecordType.Name = 'NLM Brief'), ( (NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_1__c <> NULL || NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_1__c <> '' || NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_2__c <> NULL || NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_2__c <> '') && ( ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Submit Opportunity for BS Approval') || ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Submit to BS for final concept approval') ) ) || ( (NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_3__c <> NULL || NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_3__c <> '' || NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_2__c <> NULL || NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_2__c <> '') && ( ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Submit Opportunity for CS Approval') || ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Won') ) ) )

rules.fullName: NLM Brief Opportunity Update for no approvals
rules.description: Updates the NLM Opportunity record types to NOT allow KAM's to submit for approval
rules.formula: AND( $Setup.NLM_Global_Settings__c.Fire_NLM_Workflows__c, (RecordType.Name = 'NLM Brief Approvals'), ( (NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_1__c == NULL || NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_1__c == '') && (NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_2__c == NULL || NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_2__c == '') && (NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_3__c == NULL || NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_3__c == '') ) || ( NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Submit Opportunity for BS Approval')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Submit to BS for final concept approval')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Submit Opportunity for CS Approval')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Won')) ) )

rules.fullName: NLM Management Opportunity Update for approvals
rules.description: Updates the NLM Opportunity record types to allow KAM's to submit for approval
rules.formula: AND( $Setup.NLM_Global_Settings__c.Fire_NLM_Workflows__c, (RecordType.Name = 'NLM Management'), ( (NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_1__c <> NULL || NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_1__c <> '' || NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_2__c <> NULL || NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_2__c <> '') && ( ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Submit Opportunity for BS Approval') || ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Submit to BS for final concept approval') ) ) || ( (NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_3__c <> NULL || NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_3__c <> '' || NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_2__c <> NULL || NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_2__c <> '') && ( ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Submit Opportunity for CS Approval') || ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Won') ) ) )

rules.fullName: NLM Management Opportunity Update for no approvals
rules.description: Updates the NLM Opportunity record types to NOT allow KAM's to submit for approval
rules.formula: AND( $Setup.NLM_Global_Settings__c.Fire_NLM_Workflows__c, (RecordType.Name = 'NLM Management Approvals'), ( (NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_1__c == NULL || NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_1__c == '') && (NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_2__c == NULL || NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_2__c == '') && (NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_3__c == NULL || NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_3__c == '') ) || ( NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Submit Opportunity for BS Approval')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Submit to BS for final concept approval')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Submit Opportunity for CS Approval')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Won')) ) )

rules.fullName: NLM Opportunity Email Alert at 90%25 probability
rules.description: An email alert to everyone on the opportunity team when the opportunity probability reaches 90%
rules.formula: AND($Setup.NLM_Global_Settings__c.Fire_NLM_Workflows__c, Probability = 0.9)

rules.fullName: NLM Opportunity Email Alert at Closed Lost
rules.description: An email alert to everyone on the opportunity team when the opportunity has been closed lost (0%)
rules.formula: AND($Setup.NLM_Global_Settings__c.Fire_NLM_Workflows__c, Probability = 0)

rules.fullName: NLM Opportunity Email Alert at Closed Won
rules.description: An email alert to everyone on the opportunity team when the opportunity has been closed won (100%)
rules.formula: AND($Setup.NLM_Global_Settings__c.Fire_NLM_Workflows__c, Probability = 1)

rules.fullName: NLM Proactive Opportunity Update for approvals
rules.description: Updates the NLM Opportunity record types to allow KAM's to submit for approval
rules.formula: AND( $Setup.NLM_Global_Settings__c.Fire_NLM_Workflows__c, (RecordType.Name = 'NLM Proactive'), ( (NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_1__c <> NULL || NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_1__c <> '' || NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_2__c <> NULL || NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_2__c <> '') && ( ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Submit Opportunity for BS Approval') || ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Submit to BS for final concept approval') ) ) || ( (NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_3__c <> NULL || NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_3__c <> '' || NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_2__c <> NULL || NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_2__c <> '') && ( ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Submit Opportunity for CS Approval') || ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Won') ) ) )

rules.fullName: NLM Proactive Opportunity Update for no approvals
rules.description: Updates the NLM Opportunity record types to NOT allow KAM's to submit for approval
rules.formula: AND( $Setup.NLM_Global_Settings__c.Fire_NLM_Workflows__c, (RecordType.Name = 'NLM Proactive Approvals'), ( (NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_1__c == NULL || NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_1__c == '') && (NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_2__c == NULL || NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_2__c == '') && (NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_3__c == NULL || NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_3__c == '') ) || ( NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Submit Opportunity for BS Approval')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Submit to BS for final concept approval')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Submit Opportunity for CS Approval')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Won')) ) )

rules.fullName: NLM Trade Marketing Opportunity Update for approvals
rules.description: Updates the NLM Opportunity record types to allow KAM's to submit for approval
rules.formula: AND( $Setup.NLM_Global_Settings__c.Fire_NLM_Workflows__c, (RecordType.Name = 'NLM Trade Marketing'), ( (NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_1__c <> NULL || NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_1__c <> '' || NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_2__c <> NULL || NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_2__c <> '') && ( ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Submit Opportunity for BS Approval') || ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Submit to BS for final concept approval') ) ) || ( (NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_3__c <> NULL || NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_3__c <> '' || NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_2__c <> NULL || NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_2__c <> '') && ( ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Submit Opportunity for CS Approval') || ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Won') ) ) )

rules.fullName: NLM Trade Marketing Opportunity Update for no approvals
rules.description: Updates the NLM Opportunity record types to NOT allow KAM's to submit for approval
rules.formula: AND( $Setup.NLM_Global_Settings__c.Fire_NLM_Workflows__c, (RecordType.Name = 'NLM Trade Marketing Approvals'), ( (NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_1__c == NULL || NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_1__c == '') && (NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_2__c == NULL || NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_2__c == '') && (NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_3__c == NULL || NLM_Opportunity_Team_Member_3__c == '') ) || ( NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Submit Opportunity for BS Approval')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Submit to BS for final concept approval')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Submit Opportunity for CS Approval')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Won')) ) )

rules.description: NextGen - New account veda credit check
rules.formula: Account.Has_Credit_Checked__c = FALSE

rules.description: If the owner modifies the opportunity, ensure that their role is in the current role field (used for AdSales Sales Summary roll up)
Contract negotiation omitted from forecast.
Where stage = Develop Solution/ Proposal for Brief/Historical - then update probability to 40%
rules.formula: AND( OR( ISCHANGED(StageName), ISCHANGED(Opportunity_Type__c), ISNEW() ), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity_Type__c, 'Agreement Negotiation') || ISPICKVAL(Opportunity_Type__c, 'Historical') || ISPICKVAL(Opportunity_Type__c, 'Walk-In Forecast'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Develop Solution/ Proposal') )

rules.description: Where stage = Develop Solution for Multi-Channel - then update probability to 20%
rules.formula: AND( OR( ISCHANGED(StageName), ISCHANGED(Opportunity_Type__c), ISNEW() ), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity_Type__c,'Multi-Channel'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Develop Solution/ Proposal') )

rules.description: Where stage = Present Solution/ Proposal for Brief/Historical - then update probability to 60%
rules.formula: AND( OR( ISCHANGED(StageName), ISCHANGED(Opportunity_Type__c), ISNEW() ), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity_Type__c, 'Agreement Negotiation') || ISPICKVAL(Opportunity_Type__c, 'Historical') || ISPICKVAL(Opportunity_Type__c, 'Walk-In Forecast'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Present Solution/ Proposal') )

rules.description: Where stage = Present Solution/ Proposal for Multi-Channel - then update probability to 40%
rules.formula: AND( OR( ISCHANGED(StageName), ISCHANGED(Opportunity_Type__c), ISNEW() ), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity_Type__c,'Multi-Channel'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Present Solution/ Proposal') )

rules.description: Where stage = Qualify Opty for Multi-Channel - then update probability to 05%
rules.formula: AND( OR( ISCHANGED(StageName), ISCHANGED(Opportunity_Type__c), ISNEW() ), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity_Type__c,'Multi-Channel'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Discover Needs') )

rules.description: Where stage = Re-affirm Value/Negotiate for Multi-Channel - then update probability to 30%
rules.formula: AND( OR( ISCHANGED(StageName), ISCHANGED(Opportunity_Type__c), ISNEW() ), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity_Type__c,'Multi-Channel'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Review/ Negotiate') )

rules.description: Where stage = Select Products & Update Stage (for Multi-Channel) - then update probability to 05%
rules.formula: AND( OR( ISCHANGED(StageName), ISCHANGED(Opportunity_Type__c), ISNEW() ), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity_Type__c,'Multi-Channel'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Select Product(s) and Update Stage') )

rules.description: Update recordtype to brief
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity_Type__c,'Brief'), ISCHANGED(Opportunity_Type__c), ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Brief' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Historical' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Late Space' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Agreement Negotiation' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'MultiChannel' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Proactive' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Promotions' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Self Service' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Walk-In' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Walk-In Forecast' ) )

rules.description: Update recordtype to Contract
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity_Type__c,'Agreement Negotiation'), ISCHANGED(Opportunity_Type__c), ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Brief' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Historical' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Late Space' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Agreement Negotiation' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'MultiChannel' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Proactive' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Promotions' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Self Service' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Walk-In' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Walk-In Forecast' ) )

rules.description: Update recordtype to Historical
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity_Type__c,'Historical'), ISCHANGED(Opportunity_Type__c), ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Brief' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Historical' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Late Space' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Agreement Negotiation' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'MultiChannel' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Proactive' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Promotions' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Self Service' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Walk-In' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Walk-In Forecast' ) )

rules.description: Update recordtype to LateSpace
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity_Type__c,'Late Space'), ISCHANGED(Opportunity_Type__c), ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Brief' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Historical' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Late Space' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Agreement Negotiation' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'MultiChannel' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Proactive' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Promotions' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Self Service' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Walk-In' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Walk-In Forecast' ) )

rules.description: Update recordtype to Multi-Channel
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity_Type__c,'MultiChannel'), ISCHANGED(Opportunity_Type__c), ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Brief' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Historical' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Late Space' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Agreement Negotiation' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'MultiChannel' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Proactive' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Promotions' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Self Service' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Walk-In' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Walk-In Forecast' ) )

rules.description: Update recordtype to Proactive
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity_Type__c,'Proactive'), ISCHANGED(Opportunity_Type__c), ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Brief' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Historical' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Late Space' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Agreement Negotiation' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'MultiChannel' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Proactive' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Promotions' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Self Service' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Walk-In' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Walk-In Forecast' ) )

rules.description: Update recordtype to Promotions
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity_Type__c,'Promotions'), ISCHANGED(Opportunity_Type__c), ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Brief' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Historical' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Late Space' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Agreement Negotiation' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'MultiChannel' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Proactive' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Promotions' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Self Service' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Walk-In' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Walk-In Forecast' ) )

rules.description: Update recordtype to Self-Service
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity_Type__c,'Self Service'), ISCHANGED(Opportunity_Type__c), ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Brief' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Historical' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Late Space' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Agreement Negotiation' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'MultiChannel' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Proactive' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Promotions' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Self Service' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Walk-In' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Walk-In Forecast' ) )

rules.description: Update recordtype
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity_Type__c,'Synergy Transition'), ISCHANGED(Opportunity_Type__c), ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Brief' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Historical' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Late Space' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Agreement Negotiation' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'MultiChannel' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Proactive' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Promotions' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Self Service' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Walk-In' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Walk-In Forecast' ) )

rules.description: Update recordtype to Walk-In
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity_Type__c,'Walk-In'), ISCHANGED(Opportunity_Type__c), ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Brief' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Historical' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Late Space' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Agreement Negotiation' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'MultiChannel' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Proactive' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Promotions' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Self Service' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Walk-In' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Walk-In Forecast' ) )

rules.description: Update recordtype
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity_Type__c,'Walk-In Forecast'), ISCHANGED(Opportunity_Type__c), ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Brief' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Historical' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Late Space' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Agreement Negotiation' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'MultiChannel' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Proactive' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Promotions' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Self Service' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Walk-In' ) || ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Walk-In Forecast' ) )

rules.description: Increment the Push Counter field by 1
rules.formula: IF( CloseDate > PRIORVALUE( CloseDate ), IF( CloseDate <> PRIORVALUE( CloseDate ) , TRUE, FALSE), FALSE)

rules.fullName: Update Campaign Start Date Checkbox on Opportunity
rules.formula: ISCHANGED( Campaign_Start_Date__c )
Has_an_Approved_SO__c

rules.fullName: Update Close Date Checkbox on Opportunity
rules.formula: ISCHANGED(CloseDate)
